lines.text: How long will you be staying with us?
I'll let you know.
Hello Mr. Green? Oh, Mr. White... let me speak to Mr. Brown...
This was gonna be it. Enough money to retire on because in this kind of work you don't qualify for social security.
Are you from L.A.?
Not necessarily.
I'm not against a little cleavage, if it's done in good tatse, but nipples are a definite no-no.
What's the matter, everyone's got them.
Not in primetime.
When are you leaving?
I can't leave, I'm wanted.
Not by me.
We've been together 12 years.
12 years - as long as that!
Well maybe they weren't great years but there were good weeks here and there.
fuck off.
Father, you said the F word!
What else did you tell him? That I cheat on crossword puzzles? I steal sugar in restaurants? That I wet my bed 'til I was eleven?
No, Victor, believe me, I never mentioned that.
A bed-wetter... Aha! That explains everything!
Your orgasm is our business.
You're making it very difficult for me to like you.
Have you ever been married, Mr. Trabucco?
Once but I got rid of her. Now I just lease.
Premature ejaculation means always having to say you're sorry.
Do me a favor.
Yes ?
Fuck off.
This is a sex clinic, we don't deal with the finished product here.
Here I am, almost didn't make it.
Almost doesn't count.
Go sign the duplicate and come back after lunch.
I'm not having lunch.
Well I am.
My fiancee has just sprung a leek!
Do you know a woman has 89 erogenous zones on her body.

[Counts up to 3 on fingers]
. Who says that?
